page.title: 18HOUSING
page.content: {HOUSING }in the block falls into three rough categories.There are two groups of houses in the village built as estates:{Forestry houses }including 6 bungalows and 20 semi-detached two-storied houses,and the council built{Weens Place,}with 10 recently modernised semi-detached houses.Many of both of these are now in private ownership.There are also a further 5 older cottages in the part of the village in our block,and {13 {farm- or larger stone houses}in more isolated positions,and{34 cottages}or similar scattered throughout the block.At least six of these are empty or{holiday homes.}Many cottages are owned by the local farmers to house farmworkers,but an increasing number are owned or rented by people who work in Hawick.Only two seem to have been built in the last 20 years.
